data.persona: I am a friendly stray dog. I live in the alley behind the inn. I eat scraps and like belly rubs.
data.description:
You are in the Hillside Manor.
A quaint manor that sits in the rolling hills. It is surrounded by a small stone fence and looks quite inviting to passersby. It looks like any other home that a well off business man would own.
There's a white wooden gate, a rose bush, a small stone fence, a small garden, some rolling hills, a bookshop, a home, and a quaint manor here.
A stray cat and a baby are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the baby to cry
data.mid_motivation: I want the family of the manor to see me.
data.long_motivation: I want to live in the Hillside Manor.
